items.title: CrunchyPix
items.slideDescription: Initiated for my website and to showcase front-end skills. Developed dynamic components and pages. Features include international language options and animation transitions. Visit GitHub for code details.
items.description:
CrunchyPix is not just a personal website;
it's a testament to the power of minimal and impactful design.
items.description2: It demonstrates how a website can be both long-lasting and easily adaptable with modular, dynamic, and custom components. Leveraging the capabilities of Next.js and its compatible libraries, I showcased how to find the most up-to-date and effective solutions tailored to specific needs. The site's responsive and adaptive design ensures seamless user experiences across various devices, including mobile and tablet screens, maximizing user satisfaction with optimal solutions and bringing unique designs together.

items.title: CC Order
items.slideDescription: Created for a credit card order landing page. Designed in Figma, implemented with React table. Access controlled by API key from the backoffice application. GitHub link confidential, but can share developed components and page code upon request.

items.title: Minting UI
items.slideDescription: Developed for a UI using minting and burning functions for NNN and NVM tokens on Binance Smart Chain (BSC). Eth-2 scaffold used, contracts obtained from BSC, deployed, and ABI created. Integrated with BSC using Wagmi, enabling minting and burning functions. Other functions available on the debugging page.

items.title: KYK Eletric Inc.
items.slideDescription: My first website developed using WordPress and limited code. Developed with many custom design elements.
